org.apache.catalina.Role

  • 使用Role的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.apache.catalina  
    org.apache.catalina.users  

    • org.apache.catalina中Role的使用

      返回Role的org.apache.catalina中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      Role UserDatabase.createRole(java.lang.String rolename, java.lang.String description)
      Create and return a new Role defined in this user database.
      Role UserDatabase.findRole(java.lang.String rolename)
      Return the Role with the specified role name, if any; otherwise return null.
      返回变量类型为Role的类型的org.apache.catalina中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      java.util.Iterator<Role> UserDatabase.getRoles()
      Return the set of Roles defined in this user database.
      java.util.Iterator<Role> User.getRoles()
      Return the set of Roles assigned specifically to this user.
      java.util.Iterator<Role> Group.getRoles()
      Return the set of Roles assigned specifically to this group.
      参数类型为Role的org.apache.catalina中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void User.addRole(Role role)
      Add a Role to those assigned specifically to this user.
      void Group.addRole(Role role)
      Add a new Role to those assigned specifically to this group.
      boolean User.isInRole(Role role)
      Is this user specifically assigned the specified Role?
      boolean Group.isInRole(Role role)
      Is this group specifically assigned the specified Role?
      void UserDatabase.removeRole(Role role)
      Remove the specified Role from this user database.
      void User.removeRole(Role role)
      Remove a Role from those assigned to this user.
      void Group.removeRole(Role role)
      Remove a Role from those assigned to this group.

    • org.apache.catalina.users中Role的使用

      实现Role的org.apache.catalina.users中的类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  AbstractRole
      Convenience base class for Role implementations.
      class  MemoryRole
      Concrete implementation of Role for the MemoryUserDatabase implementation of UserDatabase.
      类型参数类型为Role的org.apache.catalina.users中的字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      protected java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,Role> MemoryUserDatabase.roles
      The set of Roles defined in this database, keyed by role name.
      protected java.util.ArrayList<Role> MemoryUser.roles
      The set of Roles associated with this user.
      protected java.util.ArrayList<Role> MemoryGroup.roles
      The set of Roles associated with this group.
